originalText.text: I was post surgery when a friend highly recommended to see Jordan at Park Avenue Orthotics.  My foot was very swollen from a 7 hour surgery and needed to find something to bring swelling down.  Jordan recommended the Game Ready ice machine.  It has been a life saver.  The pain and swelling has gone down significantly and allowed for a faster recovery.  Thank you Jordan and Park Avenue Orthotics.

text.text: I was post surgery when a friend highly recommended to see Jordan at Park Avenue Orthotics.  My foot was very swollen from a 7 hour surgery and needed to find something to bring swelling down.  Jordan recommended the Game Ready ice machine.  It has been a life saver.  The pain and swelling has gone down significantly and allowed for a faster recovery.  Thank you Jordan and Park Avenue Orthotics.

originalText.text: Park Ave did right by me. I limped in, looking for a knee support. Always splitting the difference between form and function. Not necessarily an easy bill to fill. They were welcoming. No hard sell. Asked to sit down, discuss what I needed. The gent was affable. He shows me an off-the-shelf item - I slip into it. It was great. It was perfect. It gives support, isn't bulky. I ask the cost, ready to announce I can't afford it or to begin negotiations and the guy tells me and I said dang - I wearing this outta here.  I walk out wearing it. It was all very cool. Very cool.

originalText.text: Excellent service!! Very friendly and knowledgeable personal. My knee brace fits great and Jordan took his time to show me how to put in on properly. Have been wearing it all day and don't even know it's there. Can only highly recommend this place. Thank's again.

text.text: Excellent service!! Very friendly and knowledgeable personal. My knee brace fits great and Jordan took his time to show me how to put in on properly. Have been wearing it all day and don't even know it's there. Can only highly recommend this place. Thank's again.

originalText.text: I have been a client of Park Ave Ortho and, specifically, Jordan Goldschein for 2 months due to needing leg braces on both legs post-surgery. Jordan mixes technical excellence with interpersonal skills and has impressed me with is responsiveness and the care with which he has fitted and adjusted my braces. I highly recommend Park Ave Ortho.

text.text: I have been a client of Park Ave Ortho and, specifically, Jordan Goldschein for 2 months due to needing leg braces on both legs post-surgery. Jordan mixes technical excellence with interpersonal skills and has impressed me with is responsiveness and the care with which he has fitted and adjusted my braces. I highly recommend Park Ave Ortho.

originalText.text: How on earth can you charge me or anyone for that matter $150 for a 'Band-it' elbow brace when it costs $16-$19 directly from the manufacturer. To say you have to "special order" it is a joke! What did you charge me for, the entire inventory!? This is price gauging and it's going to get reported. I will also make sure everyone on your social channels are aware of your shady practices.
